select g.id, g.title, g.item_id, i.title as item_name, g.start_time, g.end_time, g.num, g.expire_time from group_booking g left join item i on g.item_id = i.id where g.deleted = false
and g.end_time < now()
and now() between g.start_time and g.end_time
and g.start_time > now()
order by g.id desc
select id, title, item_id, sku_value, num, expire_time from group_booking where id = #{bookingId} and deleted = false and now() between start_time and end_time
